div.p:
Transcribed 4.1.93. To proof read at Mitchell.
Changed […] to [unidentified] as XTF does not allow searches including "["
MS Q424 inward correspondence, A. C. Gregory papers, Dixson Library, State Library of New South Wales, Sydney.

With reference to the despatches of the Secretary of State, on the subject of the North Australian Expedition, which you have perused, I am directed by His Excellency the Governor-General to inform you, that the following are the Scientific Gentlemen who have been appointed to the Expedition and who have arrived in the Colony.
M is not listed here.

3. Dr Mueller, the Government Botanist at Melbourne, with the permission of the Government of Victoria, will join the expedition as Botanist, instead of Mr Drummond, and with the same pay and allowances as the other officers.
